name: Shattered God - Quest for the Divine Relic
description: 2D Action-RPG that has a mix of familiar and new concepts, focused on a unique, fun and challenging battle system. Unravel the lore with the new NPC system and make your own destiny with choices that affect endings, party members, and even bosses. Discover what it truly means to be a hero!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Any with 2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with 32 MB of Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Mouse AND Keyboard required
